General.Name: Anhui Tongfeng Electronics Co Ltd
General.Description: Anhui Tongfeng Electronics Company Limited engages in the research and development, production, and sales of film capacitors and film materials in the People's Republic of China. Its products include polypropylene films, metallized films, AC capacitors, DC capacitors, power electronic capacitors, polyester films, quartz crystal resonators, capacitor accessories, and precision connectors. The company products are used in home appliances, communications, power grids, rail transit, industrial control, photovoltaic, wind energy, automobile, and other industries. Anhui Tongfeng Electronics Company Limited was founded in 1952 and is based in Tongling, the People's Republic of China.

5.Name: Mr. Yunkai  Huang
5.Title: Equipment Head of Locomotive Power Capacitor Factory & Employee Rep. of the Supervisory Board
